TopicTitle: Important Notice about KSP Store passwords

Articles.Content:
Hi,

As some of you have probably noticed already, the KSP store is not accepting previously stored account passwords. This is because of a security tweak we did, which invalidated the passwords.

There is no need to worry. All account information is secure and safely stored, and no data was lost.

However, if you\'re having trouble logging into the Store, you will have to reset your password using the password reminder function. It will send an email to the address you used to register your account with instructions on how to reset your password.

We realize this is an inconvenience, but our password system is designed to be as secure as possible, and if passwords are affected in any way by a store update, they will probably need to be reset.

Cheers.
